sources.title: I'll Name The Murderer 1936
sources.description: Broadway gossip columnist Tommy Tilton (Ralph Forbes) transforms himself into an amateur detective when the body of a nightclub singer is discovered in her dressing room. The police suspect that the singer's ex-lover, Ted Benson (Malcolm MacGregor), murdered her because she had been blackmailing him . Tilton, however, is certain his old college friend, Ted, is innocent. The reporter uses his column to lure the real killer into view, intent on saving his buddy from the electric chair.
